sentences.english: Conclusions Uterine cavity and fallopian tube abnormalities were the important reason of female infertile.
sentences.chinese: 结论子宫腔及输卵管形态异常是不孕症的重要原因。

sentences.english: The mainstay of treatment of pelvic factor infertility relies on laparoscopy and hysteroscopy.
sentences.chinese: 盆腔因素的不孕症的治疗主要依赖于腹腔镜和宫腔镜。

sentences.english: He formulated early a vision to develop an in vitro fertilization method to treat infertility.
sentences.chinese: 他很早就提出了用体外受精来解决不孕症的办法。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the usefulness of digital fluoroscopy in the diagnosis and treatment of the infertility.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨数字透视在不孕症诊断和治疗中的应用价值。

sentences.english: The decrease of endometrial receptivity is one of mechanism of infertility with kidney-deficiency syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 子宫内膜容受性下降为肾虚不孕症的发病机制之一。

sentences.english: Can you explain the link between celiac and infertility?
sentences.chinese: 你能解释一下麸质过敏症和不孕症之间的联系吗？

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the therapeutic effects of combined hysteroscopy and laparoscopy in treatment of infertility.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究宫腹腔镜联合应用治疗不孕症患者的疗效。

sentences.english: What infertility treatment options are you able to offer?
sentences.chinese: 你们能提供什么样的不孕症治疗方案？

sentences.english: Find out as much as you can about your insurance coverage and make financial plans regarding your fertility treatments.
sentences.chinese: 尽量掌握与你有关的不孕症保险条款和制订财务计划。

sentences.english: The author evaluated 567 endometrial biopsies that had been performed for investigating infertility.
sentences.chinese: 对567例不孕症妇女进行子宫内膜活检。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the chief reason of barrenness.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨不孕症的主要原因。

sentences.english: Has original opinion in sterility. She is good at treat kinds of disease by integration of western medicine and TCM.
sentences.chinese: 可及时准确地诊治各种性病，对不孕症也有独到见解。

sentences.english: It has also been used as a diuretic and to treat infertility.
sentences.chinese: 它也被用来作为一种利尿剂和治疗不孕症。

definition: to be infertile/to have no offspring
vaginal infection/inflammation of the vulva or vagina/colpitis
